casebody.data:
No. 10-1032. Steve Magner, et al., Petitioners v. Thomas J. Gallagher, et al. 565 U.S. 1013, 132 S. Ct. 548,

181 L. Ed. 2d 395,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 8002. November 7, 2011.

Motion of International Municipal Lawyers Association for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eighth Circuit granted.

Same case below, 619 F.3d 823.
